RestConnector.Title: Domain Overview
RestConnector.HelpText: Provides live or historical data on a domainâ€™s keyword rankings in both organic and paid search in all regional databases.

Field.Title: Database
Field.HelpText: Regional database (US, UK, Italy, etc.)

Field.Title: Domain
Field.HelpText: A website's position for a particular keyword in Google's top 20 organic search results.

Field.Title: Rank
Field.HelpText: The SEMrush rating of the website's popularity based on organic traffic coming from Google's top 20 organic search results.

Field.Title: Organic Keywords
Field.HelpText: Keywords that bring users to a website via Google's top 20 organic search results.

Field.Title: Organic Traffic
Field.HelpText: Traffic brought to a website via Google's top 20 organic search results.

Field.HelpText: Estimated price of organic keywords in Google AdWords.

Field.HelpText: Keywords a website is buying in Google AdWords for ads that appear in paid search results.

Field.Title: Adwords Traffic

Field.HelpText: Estimated budget spent buying keywords in Google AdWords for ads that appear in paid search results (monthly estimation).

Field.HelpText: The difference between the previous position a domain was earning with a particular keyword and its current position.

Field.HelpText: The average number of times users have searched for a given keyword per month. We calculate this value over the last 12 months.

Field.Title: URL

Field.HelpText: The share of traffic driven to the website with a particular keyword for a specified period.

Field.HelpText: Competitive density of advertisers using the given term for their ads. One (1) means the highest competition.

Field.Title: Traffic Cost (%)
Field.HelpText: The total amount spent on keywords in Google AdWords for which the domain is ranking in search results.

Field.Title: Trends
Field.HelpText: The interest of searchers in a particular keyword during the last 12 months. This metric is based on changes in the number of queries per month.
